word: G2114 - εὐθυμέω - euthyméō - yoo-thoo-meh'-o - Be of good cheer

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Be of good cheer
1. to put in good spirits, gladden, make cheerful
2. to be joyful, be of good cheer, of good courage
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G2115; to cheer up, that is, (intransitively) be cheerful; neuter comparative (adverb) more cheerfully: - be of good cheer (merry).
